languages.text: {n}Я должна думать о следующей жертве, но почему-то мысли мои крутятся лишь вокруг момента, когда я вновь предстану перед Домин и расскажу, что узрела. Будет ли он{rt_mf||а} гордиться мной? Будет ли довол{rt_mf|ен|ьна}? Это неправильно.{/n}

{n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Я должна думать о следующей жертве, но почему-то мысли мои крутятся лишь вокруг момента, когда я вновь предстану перед Домин и расскажу, что узрела. Будет ли он{rt_mf||а} гордиться мной? Будет ли довол{rt_mf|ен|ьна}? Это неправильно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}I should be thinking about the hunt, but for some reason my thoughts revolve only around the moment when I will stand before Enim again and tell {mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

{n}I should be thinking about the hunt, but for some reason my thoughts revolve only around the moment when I will stand before Enim again and tell {mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

{n}I should be thinking about the hunt, but for some reason, my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Enim once more and tell {mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

{n}I should be thinking about the hunt, but for some reason, my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Enim once more and tell {mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

{n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

{n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ich sollte an die Jagd denken, und dennoch sind meine Gedanken nur bei dem Moment, wenn ich wieder vor Domin'{rt_name} stehe und {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} berichte, was ich gesehen habe. Wird {rt_mf|er|sie} stolz auf mich sein? Wird {rt_mf|er|sie} sich freuen? Das ist falsch.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ich sollte an die Jagd denken, und dennoch sind meine Gedanken nur bei dem Moment, wenn ich wieder vor Domin'{rt_name} stehe und {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} berichte, was ich gesehen habe. Wird {rt_mf|er|sie} stolz auf mich sein? Wird {rt_mf|er|sie} sich freuen? Das ist falsch.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Debería estar pensando en la caza, y sin embargo mis pensamientos solo se centran en el momento en el que me presentaré ante Domin’{rt_name} una vez más y le diré lo que he visto. ¿Se sentirá orgullos{rt_mf|o|a} de mí? ¿Se sentirá satisfech{rt_mf|o|a}? Esto no debería ser así.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Debería estar pensando en la caza, y sin embargo mis pensamientos solo se centran en el momento en el que me presentaré ante Domin’{rt_name} una vez más y le diré lo que he visto. ¿Se sentirá orgullos{rt_mf|o|a} de mí? ¿Se sentirá satisfech{rt_mf|o|a}? Esto no debería ser así.{/n}

languages.text: {n}狩りのことを考えなければならないのに、頭に浮かぶのは、もう一度ドミン・{rt_name}の前に立ち、見てきたことを{rt_mf|彼|彼女}に伝える瞬間のことばかり。私を誇りに思ってくれるだろうか？喜んでくれるだろうか？こんなの、間違っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}狩りのことを考えなければならないのに、頭に浮かぶのは、もう一度エニム・{name}の前に立ち、見てきたことを{mf|彼|彼女}に伝える瞬間のことばかり。私を誇りに思ってくれるだろうか？喜んでくれるだろうか？こんなの、間違っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}我本该想着狩猎的事情，但此时此刻，我只想再次站在秘者{rt_name}面前，告诉{rt_mf|他|她}我所看到的一切。{rt_mf|他|她}会满意吗？{rt_mf|他|她}会为我感到骄傲吗？这种想法是错误的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}我本该想着狩猎的事情，但此时此刻，我只想再次站在秘者{rt_name}面前，告诉{rt_mf|他|她}我所看到的一切。{rt_mf|他|她}会满意吗？{rt_mf|他|她}会为我感到骄傲吗？这种想法是错误的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Je devrais songer à la chasse, et pourtant, toutes mes pensées sont tournées vers le moment où je me tiendrai à nouveau devant {rt_mf|le|la} Domin'{rt_name} pour lui dire ce que j'ai vu. Sera-t-{rt_mf|il fier|elle fière} de moi ? Sera-t-{rt_mf|il satisfait|elle satisfaite} ? Je dois me reprendre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Je devrais songer à la chasse, et pourtant, toutes mes pensées sont tournées vers le moment où je me tiendrai à nouveau devant {rt_mf|le|la} Domin'{rt_name} pour lui dire ce que j'ai vu. Sera-t-{rt_mf|il fier|elle fière} de moi ? Sera-t-{rt_mf|il satisfait|elle satisfaite} ? Je dois me reprendre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avı düşünmem gerekiyor ancak düşüncelerim, Domin'{rt_name} huzurunda bir kez daha yerimi alıp gördüklerimi ona anlatacağım ana odaklanıyor. Benimle gurur duyacak mı? Memnun olacak mı? Tüm bunlar çok yanlış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}I should be thinking about the hunt, and yet my thoughts now lie only with the moment when I will stand before Domin'{rt_name} once more and tell {rt_mf|him|her} what I have seen. Will {rt_mf|he|she} be proud of me? Will {rt_mf|he|she} be pleased? This is wrong.{/n}
